header.rec_loc: in the car driving from High Lane, Stockport to Macclesfield, Cheshire.
header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Getting new furniture, the tip, ANON's friend and her family, other people washing your clothes, our extended family, unwanted presents, grandparents, new building, swearing, the beaver scout Christmas party, a boy from Primary School, network scouts, ANON's friend ANON, ANON's ill partner, dementia, ANONâ€™s friend.
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, inquiring, complaining, anecdote telling
